metadata.name: Where the Soul Lives
metadata.description:
Through the small circle she held, I saw a shining world.

There was a sea of creative energy out there.

She was bound, but with a strong yearning
With a childhood memory in her heart

She chose to dedicate the other half of her life to creating .

I am grateful for the precious existence that keeps me alive and I receive their energy.

——

彼女が持つ小さな輪から、輝く世界が見えた

そこには、創造的なエネルギーの海が広がっていた

彼女には束縛があったが、強い憧れと
幼いころの想い出を胸に

残りの半生を
創作に捧げることを選んだ

私を生かす尊い存在に感謝をし
エネルギーを受け取る



5,787 x 8,185‬
